name: VR Solo Noble(Peg solitaire)
description:
This is a challenging single-player checkers, an intellectual test for smart people.
In the game, you will play a smart giant and enjoy your leisure time in your own castle manor.

Compared with the long description of the rules in general board games, we provide a more intuitive video display, and intimately show the movable position of each movable piece in the game.

The fewer steps you use, the fewer pieces you have left on the board, and the smarter you are.

In addition to regular chess games, we also provide some basic levels for beginners, in which you can improve your logical thinking ability.

Game operation:
Right handle trigger button click to control the movement of the pieces
